# Cloud Storage Application Instructions

This project is an ASP.NET MVC cloud storage application similar to Google Drive, TeraBox, or FShare.

## Project Features
- User authentication and registration
- File upload and download
- Folder creation and management
- File sharing with access controls
- Search functionality
- Responsive web design
- File preview capabilities
- Storage quota management

## Development Guidelines
- Use Entity Framework for data persistence
- Implement proper security measures for file access
- Follow MVC architecture patterns
- Use modern CSS frameworks for responsive design
- Implement proper error handling and logging
- Follow ASP.NET Core best practices

## Architecture
- Controllers: Handle HTTP requests and responses
- Models: Data models for users, files, folders, and sharing
- Views: Razor pages with responsive UI
- Services: Business logic for file operations
- Data: Entity Framework context and repositories
